channel.title: Please help!
channel.description: ok when i try to add [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,242154.0.html]this[/url] tut my server crashes and i get this before everyone logs out [code]Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NullPointerException at client.process(client.java:12979) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:137) at server.main(server.java:48)[/code]

item.title: Please help!
item.dc:creator: @BurnInSilence BurnInSilence
item.description:
@BurnInSilence wrote:

  1. that tut is HORRIBLEâ€¦thats not how vengeance is supposed to work + it makes your client.java alot bigger which is BAD

    i made it by myself and its small, works how it does on rs, and you wouldnt have problems like this
  2. hit ctrl+g and go to line 12979
